thread.title: Samuel Inkoom returns to action with Boavista in Portuguese cup game
thread.title_full: Samuel Inkoom returns to action with Boavista in Portuguese cup game

title: Samuel Inkoom returns to action with Boavista in Portuguese cup game
text:
15:10 CET Samuel Inkoom returns to action with Boavista in Portuguese cup game 
Ghana and Boavista defender Samuel Inkoom finally returned to action with his club after playing in his side's 1-1 draw game against Feirense in the Teca de Portuguese. 
Inkoom returned to the pitch after sitting out his sides last three games. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
